original_text: When Jesus was getting near to Jericho, a blind man was sitting by the side of the road. He was asking people to give him money.
korean_text: 여리고에 가까이 가셨을 때에 한 맹인이 길 가에 앉아 구걸하다가

sentences.original_text: When Jesus was getting near to Jericho
a blind man was sitting by the side of the road
He was asking people to give him money
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 사람들에게 돈을 달라고 요청하고 있었다
